info.title: API Documentation
info.description:
<h4>Authentication.</h4>
<p>Authentication is done with X-API-KEY. You can request a key via mail to api@cargoboard.com.

post.description: This endpoint is used to place a Quotation for a shipment.

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

get.description: This endpoint is used to Get quotations.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for next page of quotations

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

post.summary: Book an Order Based on a Quotation
post.description: This endpoint is used to Book an Order Based on a Quotation.

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

post.description: Authorization with customer token (XApiKey) or user token (Bearer). Orders placed on this endpoint need confirmation for authorization different than wih XApiKey that is customers tokenApi.

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

get.description: This endpoint is used to Get orders.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for next page of orders

post.description: Authorization with customer token (XApiKey) or user token (Bearer). Header x-api-key required as cancellation token. For value of id parameter, CUID or reference of order are accepted.

409.description: Order cannot be cancelled due to its current state.

get.summary: Print shipment label for an Order
get.description: Authorization with customer token (XApiKey) or user token (Bearer). For value of id parameter, CUID or reference of order are accepted.

200.description: Orders confirmation shipment labels pdf stream successfully delivered

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

get.description: Authorization with customer token (XApiKey) or user token (Bearer). For value of id parameter, CUID or reference of order are accepted.

200.description: Orders confirmation pdf stream successfully delivered

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

get.description: This endpoint is used to Get invoices.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Quantity of Easybill invoices to take

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for next page of Easybill invoices

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter results by properties For example, postCodeFrom="33100"

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: Get total quantity of easybill invoices

get.description: Authorization with API_CARGOBOARD_TOKEN OR JWT Token.

200.description: Easybill Invoice pdf stream successfully delivered

409.description: EasybillInvoice pdf could not be delivered.

get.summary: Get tracking information for an Order
get.description: Authorization with customer token (XApiKey) or user token (Bearer). For value of id parameter, CUID or reference of order are accepted.

409.description: Authorized user is not a customer

pickupAtFrom.description: Date with time of start of pickup for the product. Allowed days are days from Monday till Friday. Either pickupOn or pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is enough to be set. If value of pickupOn and pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is set, date part (a day) must be the same.

pickupAtUntil.description: Date with time of end of pickup for the product. Allowed days are days from Monday till Friday. Either pickupOn or pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is enough to be set. If value of pickupOn and pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is set, date part (a day) must be the same.

pickupOn.description: Date without time of pickup for the product. Allowed days are days from Monday till Friday. Either pickupOn or pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is enough to be set. If value of pickupOn and pickupAtFrom and pickupAtUntil is set, date part (a day) must be the same.

wantsContactBeforePickup.description: A service where a Logistic Company contacts the customer by phone days/hours before the pickup and arranges an appointment for the pickup. This is often booked when a customer is not on site every time and needs an exact time.

wantsPhoneCallFromDriverBeforePickup.description: A service where a Logistic Company contacts the customer by phone about 30 - 60 minutes before pickup at the customer location to pickup the shipment.

loadingType.description: Loading type (collection). Possible values RAMP, SIDE, CRANE, LIFTING_PLATFORM_OR_TAIL_LIFT_TRUCK

wantsContactBeforeDelivery.description: A service where a Logistic Company contacts the customer by phone days/hours before the delivery and arranges an appointment for the delivery. This is often booked when a customer is not on site every time and needs an exact time.

wantsPhoneCallFromDriverBeforeDelivery.description: A service where a Logistic Company contacts the customer by phone about 30 - 60 minutes before arriving at the customer location to deliver the shipment.

wantsDeliveryWithoutConsigneePresence.description: A service where delivery will not require consignee presence.

reference.description: Reference number of the consignee. Driver will use this reference to notify the consignee.

deliveryOn.description: Date of delivery for fix product. Allowed delivery dates from Monday till Friday.

unloadingType.description: Unloading type (delivery). Possible values RAMP, SIDE, CRANE, LIFTING_PLATFORM_OR_TAIL_LIFT_TRUCK

isStackable.description: If set to true, packages are loadable and stackable.

wantsPalletExchange.description: If set to true, pallets exchange is required for a line.

additionalEuroPallets.description: Additional euro Pallets for the line (e.g. as top or side protection).

dangerousGoods.description: Dangerous Goods for a quotation line.

type.description: Cost item type. Possible values: DANGEROUS_GOODS, PRIVATE_CUSTOMER, IMPORT_DUTIES, CONTACT_BEFORE_PICKUP, TAIL_LIFT_TRUCK, PREMIUM_DELIVERY, CONTACT_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_PICKUP, DELIVERY_WITHOUT_CONSIGNEE_PRESENCE, TRANSPORT_INSURANCE, EXPORT_DECLARATION, ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS, PALLET_EXCHANGE, CLIMATE_NEUTRAL_SURCHARGE, SHIPMENT, GENERAL_MARGIN, CUSTOMIZED_MARGIN, ACTUAL_COST_CORRECTION, FUEL_SURCHARGE, CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT, COUPON.

subtype.description: Cost item subtype. Possible values: PICKUP_ADVISE, DELIVERY_ADVISE, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_PICKUP, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_DELIVERY, TAIL_LIFT, TAIL_LIFT_PICKUP, TAIL_LIFT_DELIVERY, DELIVERY_WHITOUT_CONSIGNEE_PRESENCE, PREMIUM_DELIVERY, PRIVATE_CONSIGNEE, EXPRESS_16, EXPRESS_12, EXPRESS_10, EXPRESS_8, FIX_16, FIX_12, FIX_10, FIX_8, PICKUP_BEFORE_12, PICKUP_AFTER_12, DELIVERY_BEFORE_12, DELIVERY_AFTER_12, EXPORT_DECLARATION, IMPORT_DECLARATION.

currency.description: Currency for price. Possible values: EUR.

product.description: The product for which a quotation should be received. Possible values: DIRECT, EXPRESS, EXPRESS_8, EXPRESS_10, EXPRESS_12, EXPRESS_16, FIX, FIX_8, FIX_10, FIX_12, FIX_16, STANDARD.

transportType.description: Transport type of order. Possible values GROUPAGE, PART_LOAD, DIRECT

customerOrderCode.description: A code applied by customer that will appear on documents as CustomerOrderNo

couponCode.description: A code applied by customer that will allow for special actions like discount etc.

wantsExportDeclaration.description: A service where shipment will be declared for customs. Some customers do this by themselves and others book this option. This service should be only possible if shipment goes to, or comes from a country outside of the EU, like Great Britain, Norway, Switzerland.

wantsClimateNeutralShipment.description: Negative environmental impact will be reduced for this service.

wantsInsurance.description: Cargoboard will organize an insurance for this shipment. goodsValueAmount is necessary if you set wantsInsurance

incoterm.description: Incoterm - should always be STANDARD and if you ship to Switzerland, or UK it should be DAP

valueOfGoodsAmount.description: Amount of money - value of goods for insurance or customs

valueOfGoodsCurrency.description: Currency of value of goods. Possible values EUR

status.description: Status of order. Possible values INITIALIZED, CREATED, CANCELLED

priceCurrency.description: Status of order. Possible values EUR

priceCurrencyStandard.description: Price currency standard. Possible values EUR

truckType.description: Truck type of order. Possible values DIRECT_BUS_PLANE, DIRECT_BUS_PLANE_XXL, DIRECT_TRUCK_7_5, DIRECT_TRUCK_12, DIRECT_TRUCK_40

quantityOfEuroPallets.description: Quantity of euro pallets from lines.

method.description: Http method like: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE.

product.description: The product for which a quotation should be received. Possible values: DIRECT, EXPRESS, EXPRESS_8, EXPRESS_10, EXPRESS_12, EXPRESS_16, FIX, FIX_8, FIX_10, FIX_12, FIX_16, STANDARD.

isSupplyingCompanyOrReceivingCustomer.description: Has to be set if shipment is going to Switzerland or other non-EU countries for tax reasons. If true customer is supplying company or receiving customer.

product.description: The product. Possible values: DIRECT, EXPRESS, EXPRESS_8, EXPRESS_10, EXPRESS_12, EXPRESS_16, FIX, FIX_8, FIX_10, FIX_12, FIX_16, STANDARD.

additionalEuroPallets.description: Additional euro Pallets for the line (e.g. as top or side protection).

dangerousGoods.description: Dangerous Goods for an order line.

barcodes.description: Barcodes - one per every unit in line.

id.description: Id of order related to Easybill Invoice.
Id of customer related to Easybill Invoice.

documentId.description: Id of document (invoice) on Easybill API.

isDocumentCompleted.description: If true document has been completed on Easybill API.

documentCompletedAt.description: Date of document completed on Easybill API.

isDocumentCopiedToArchive.description: If true document has been copied from Easybill API to GCP storage archive.

isDocumentCopiedToArchiveZipped.description: If true document copied from Easybill API to GCP storage archive is zipped.

documentCopiedToArchiveAt.description: Date of document copy from Easybill API to GCP storage archive.

isDocumentSent.description: If true document has been sent on Easybill API.

documentSentAt.description: Date of document sent on Easybill API.

isDocumentCancelled.description: If true document has been cancelled on Easybill API.

documentCancelledAt.description: Date of document cancellation on Easybill API.

documentNumber.description: Number for document (invoice) on Easybill API.

cancellationDocumentId.description: Id for cancellation document (invoice) on Easybill API.

isCancellationDocumentSent.description: If true cancellation document has been cancelled on Easybill API.

cancellationDocumentSentAt.description: Date of cancellation document sent on Easybill API.

isDone.description: If true invoicing for related orders is finished on Easybill API.

dueDate.description: Date (time part value will be omitted) to when invoice should be paid.

dueInDays.description: Period of time in days to when invoice should be paid.

paymentCurrency.description: Currency for payment. Possible values: EUR.

type.description: Cost item type. Possible values: DANGEROUS_GOODS, PRIVATE_CUSTOMER, IMPORT_DUTIES, CONTACT_BEFORE_PICKUP, TAIL_LIFT_TRUCK, PREMIUM_DELIVERY, CONTACT_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_PICKUP, DELIVERY_WITHOUT_CONSIGNEE_PRESENCE, TRANSPORT_INSURANCE, EXPORT_DECLARATION, ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS, PALLET_EXCHANGE, CLIMATE_NEUTRAL_SURCHARGE, SHIPMENT, GENERAL_MARGIN, CUSTOMIZED_MARGIN, ACTUAL_COST_CORRECTION, FUEL_SURCHARGE, CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT, COUPON.

currency.description: Currency for price. Possible values: EUR.

easybillDocumentPositionId.description: Easybill document position id is id field from DocumentPosition Resource. Facilitates matching CostItem on Cargoboard API with DocumentPosition on Easybill API.

isInvoiceable.description: Cost item is invoiceable when is set for being part of invoice but is not on one already and its sell price is different than zero.

product.description: The product for which a quotation should be received. Possible values: DIRECT, EXPRESS, EXPRESS_8, EXPRESS_10, EXPRESS_12, EXPRESS_16, FIX, FIX_8, FIX_10, FIX_12, FIX_16, STANDARD.

transportType.description: Transport type of order. Possible values GROUPAGE, PART_LOAD, DIRECT

isSupplyingCompanyOrReceivingCustomer.description: If true customer is supplying company or receiving customer

valueOfGoodsAmount.description: Amount of money - value of goods for insurance or customs

valueOfGoodsCurrency.description: Currency of value of goods. Possible values EUR

status.description: Status of order. Possible values INITIALIZED, CREATED, WAITING_FOR_PAYMENT, CANCELLED

paymentMethod.description: Payment methods of order. Possible values INVOICE, SEPA, PAY_PAL, GIROPAY, CREDIT_CARD, DIRECT_DEBIT, PREPAYMENT, NO_PAYMENT

refundType.description: RefundType of order. Possible values FULL, PARTIAL, NO

priceCurrencyStandard.description: Price currency standard. Possible values EUR

truckType.description: Truck type of order. Possible values DIRECT_BUS_PLANE, DIRECT_BUS_PLANE_XXL, DIRECT_TRUCK_7_5, DIRECT_TRUCK_12, DIRECT_TRUCK_40

shipmentStatus.description: Shipment status of order. Possible values CREATED, IN_DISPOSITION, COLLECTED, TRANSIT, DELIVERED, ACTION_REQUIRED, CANCELLED, IN_DELIVERY, SCHEDULED, WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMS_CLEARANCE, MISSING_INFORMATION, ALL_DOCUMENTS_PRESENT

tariffCategory.description: Tariff category of order. Possible values A, B, C

isCountryWithCustoms.description: True if  shipper or consignee is in one of the countries with customs.

isShipperCountryWithCustoms.description: True if  shipper is in one of the countries with customs.

isCharterShipment.description: True for Charter shipment (transport type direct or part-load).

quantityOfEuroPallets.description: Quantity of euro pallets from lines.

linesUnitsQuantity.description: Quantity of units from lines - all possible package types.

linesPackagesQuantity.description: Quantity of units from lines - package type KT (Cardboard).

isInvoiceable.description: An order is considered invoiceable under the following conditions: a) If no invoice exists for the order. b) If there are existing invoices for the order, the actual price of the remaining uninvoiced cost items should be different from 0.

type.description: Cost item type. Possible values: DANGEROUS_GOODS, PRIVATE_CUSTOMER, IMPORT_DUTIES, CONTACT_BEFORE_PICKUP, TAIL_LIFT_TRUCK, PREMIUM_DELIVERY, CONTACT_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_DELIVERY, PHONE_CALL_FROM_DRIVER_BEFORE_PICKUP, DELIVERY_WITHOUT_CONSIGNEE_PRESENCE, TRANSPORT_INSURANCE, EXPORT_DECLARATION, ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS, PALLET_EXCHANGE, CLIMATE_NEUTRAL_SURCHARGE, SHIPMENT, GENERAL_MARGIN, CUSTOMIZED_MARGIN, ACTUAL_COST_CORRECTION, FUEL_SURCHARGE, CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT, COUPON.

originatedAt.description: Date and time when status event happened.
Date and time when status event happened.

estimatedCollectionAtFrom.description: Date and time of collection from happened.

estimatedCollectionAtUntil.description: Date and time of collection until happened.

estimatedArrivalAtFrom.description: Date and time of arrival from happened.

estimatedArrivalAtUntil.description: Date and time of arrival until happened.

originatedAt.description: Date and time when status event happened.

estimatedCollectionAtFrom.description: Date and time of collection from happened.

estimatedCollectionAtUntil.description: Date and time of collection until happened.

estimatedArrivalAtFrom.description: Date and time of arrival from happened.

estimatedArrivalAtUntil.description: Date and time of arrival until happened.

statusEventHistory.description: Historic status events of the tracking
Historic status events of the tracking

PickupOrderNo.description: Place Cargoboard order reference [1CCCCCCC] or Cepra object id [CCCCCCCC-CCCC-CCCC-CCCC-CCCCCCCCCCCC] here.

DeliveryObjectRef.description: Place Cargoboard order reference [1CCCCCCC] or Cepra object id [CCCCCCCC-CCCC-CCCC-CCCC-CCCCCCCCCCCC] here.

tags.name: Cargoboard
tags.description: Cargoboard is a freight forwarding platform for Europe.
